ValidationRule.description: A Case can only be Reopened from a Closed status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Reopened"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed-Accepted")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed-Rejected")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Een Case mag alleen vanuit Status "Gesloten" naar "Heropend"
